BadgeDetail.Name: Bandsaw
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has attended a full demonstration of correct machine use. They have demonstrated on multiple occasions the correct and safe use of a bandsaw. They have shown knowledge of basic maintenance of this machine including changing a bandsaw blade. They are competent to use this tool in the workshop environment.

Task.Title: Bandsaw
Task.Body: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating safe use of a bandsaw.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating safe use of a bandsaw.
Task.TextileBody: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating safe use of a bandsaw.

Task.Title: Blade change
Task.Body: Upload 1 photograph/video showing a blade change.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload 1 photograph/video showing a blade change.
Task.TextileBody: Upload 1 photograph/video showing a blade change.
